languages.text: В дни мятежа многие изнеженные дворяне Януса бежали с планеты. Их места надлежит занять более предприимчивым слугам. Небольшой, но амбициозный синдикат Ультреквизиторов, состоящий в Миссии Касбаллики, обратился к Вольному Торговцу со смиренной просьбой доверить им управление Янусом. Владайм Токара выживает из хладного торга всех конкурентов, и Ультреквизиторы надеются сменить сферу деятельности, став почтенными аристократами — слугами династии фон Валанциус.

traits.locale_text: Сменить местную знать, пригласить "эффективных управленцев" и дать пролезть и укрепиться на планете Касбаллике, которой интересен мир ксеносов.

languages.text: In the days of the mutiny, many among Janus's pampered nobility fled the planet. They are to be replaced with more enterprising servants. A small but ambitious Ultrequisitor syndicate belonging to the Kasballica Mission has contacted the Rogue Trader with a lowly request to entrust the governance of Janus to them. With Vladaym Tocara pushing all of his competitors out of the Cold Trade, the Ultrequisitors are hoping to change their line of business and become dignified aristocrats serving House von Valancius.
languages.original_text: В дни мятежа многие изнеженные дворяне Януса бежали с планеты. Их места надлежит занять более предприимчивым слугам. Небольшой, но амбициозный синдикат Ультреквизиторов, состоящий в Миссии Касбаллики, обратился к Вольному Торговцу со смиренной просьбой доверить им управление Янусом. With Vladaym Tocara pushing all of his competitors out of the Cold Trade, the Ultrequisitors are hoping to change their line of business and become dignified aristocrats serving House von Valancius.

A small but ambitious Ultrequisitor syndicate belonging to the Kasballica Mission has contacted the Rogue Trader with a lowly request to entrust the governance of Janus to them. With Vladaym Tocara pushing all of his competitors out of the Cold Trade, the Ultrequisitors are hoping to change their line of business and become dignified aristocrats serving House von Valancius.

languages.text: Durante los días del motín, muchos de los nobles mimados de Janus huyeron del planeta. Es necesario sustituirlos por sirvientes más emprendedores. Un sindicato pequeño pero ambicioso de Ultrequisadores pertenecientes a la misión Kasballica ha contactado con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente con una humilde petición para que les confíe la gestión de Janus. Ahora que Vladaym Tocara está expulsando a sus competidores del Comercio Frío, los Ultrequisadores quieren cambiar de negocio y convertirse en dignos aristócratas al servicio de la casa von Valancius.
languages.original_text: In the days of the mutiny, many among Janus's pampered nobility fled the planet. They are to be replaced with more enterprising servants. A small but ambitious Ultrequisitor syndicate belonging to the Kasballica Mission has contacted the Rogue Trader with a lowly request to entrust the governance of Janus to them. With Vladaym Tocara pushing all of his competitors out of the Cold Trade, the Ultrequisitors are hoping to change their line of business and become dignified aristocrats serving House von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: Durante los días del motín, muchos de los nobles mimados de Janus huyeron del planeta. Es necesario sustituirlos por sirvientes más emprendedores. Un sindicato pequeño pero ambicioso de Ultrequisadores pertenecientes a la misión Kasballica ha contactado con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente con una humilde petición para que les confíe la gestión de Janus. Ahora que Vladaym Tocara está expulsando a sus competidores del Comercio Frío, los Ultrequisadores quieren cambiar de negocio y convertirse en dignos aristócratas al servicio de la casa von Valancius.

languages.text: Lors de la mutinerie, une part importante de la noblesse dorée de Janus a fui la planète. Il faudra remplacer ces déserteurs par des sujets autrement plus entreprenants. Un modeste mais ambitieux syndicat d'Ultrequisitors appartenant à la Mission de la Kasballica a contacté {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} pour lui demander de lui confier la gouvernance de Janus. Vladaym Tocara ayant évincé tous ses concurrents dans le Commerce Froid, ils espèrent ainsi changer de secteur d'activité et devenir de respectables aristocrates au service de la maison von Valancius.
languages.original_text: In the days of the mutiny, many among Janus's pampered nobility fled the planet. They are to be replaced with more enterprising servants. A small but ambitious Ultrequisitor syndicate belonging to the Kasballica Mission has contacted the Rogue Trader with a lowly request to entrust the governance of Janus to them. With Vladaym Tocara pushing all of his competitors out of the Cold Trade, the Ultrequisitors are hoping to change their line of business and become dignified aristocrats serving House von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: Lors de la mutinerie, une part importante de la noblesse dorée de Janus a fui la planète. Il faudra remplacer ces déserteurs par des sujets autrement plus entreprenants. Un modeste mais ambitieux syndicat d'Ultrequisitors appartenant à la Mission de la Kasballica a contacté {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} pour lui demander de lui confier la gouvernance de Janus. Vladaym Tocara ayant évincé tous ses concurrents dans le Commerce Froid, ils espèrent ainsi changer de secteur d'activité et devenir de respectables aristocrates au service de la maison von Valancius.

languages.text: 在动乱的日子里，许多养尊处优的加努斯贵族仓皇逃离了那颗行星，他们将被更加锐意进取的仆人所取代。卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团麾下某个规模不大却野心勃勃的团伙联系上了行商浪人。他们自称“巨贩帮”，谦卑地恳求获得治理加努斯的权利。当弗拉迪姆·托卡拉将所有竞争对手逐出冷市贸易行业之后，巨贩帮打算改变发展策略，成为侍奉冯·瓦兰修斯家族的正统贵族。
languages.original_text: In the days of the mutiny, many among Janus's pampered nobility fled the planet. They are to be replaced with more enterprising servants. A small but ambitious Ultrequisitor syndicate belonging to the Kasballica Mission has contacted the Rogue Trader with a lowly request to entrust the governance of Janus to them. With Vladaym Tocara pushing all of his competitors out of the Cold Trade, the Ultrequisitors are hoping to change their line of business and become dignified aristocrats serving House von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: 在动乱的日子里，许多养尊处优的加努斯贵族仓皇逃离了那颗行星，他们将被更加锐意进取的仆人所取代。卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团麾下某个规模不大却野心勃勃的团伙联系上了行商浪人。他们自称“巨贩帮”，谦卑地恳求获得治理加努斯的权利。当弗拉迪姆·托卡拉将所有竞争对手逐出冷市贸易行业之后，巨贩帮打算改变发展策略，成为侍奉冯·瓦兰修斯家族的正统贵族。

languages.text: 反乱の時代、ヤヌスの甘やかされた貴族の多くが惑星から逃亡した。彼らは、より進取の気性に富んだ使用人に取って代わられることになる。カスバリカ聖務団に所属する小規模だが野心的なウルトラレクイジター・シンジケートが、ヤヌスの統治を彼らに任せてほしいという下卑た要求をもってローグトレーダーに接触してきた。ヴラダイム・トカラがすべての競争相手を冷たき取引から追い出したため、ウルトレクイジターたちは自分たちの商売のやり方を変え、フォン・ヴァランシウス家に仕える威厳ある貴族になることを望んでいるのだ。
languages.original_text: In the days of the mutiny, many among Janus's pampered nobility fled the planet. They are to be replaced with more enterprising servants. A small but ambitious Ultrequisitor syndicate belonging to the Kasballica Mission has contacted the Rogue Trader with a lowly request to entrust the governance of Janus to them. With Vladaym Tocara pushing all of his competitors out of the Cold Trade, the Ultrequisitors are hoping to change their line of business and become dignified aristocrats serving House von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: 反乱の時代、ヤヌスの甘やかされた貴族の多くが惑星から逃亡した。彼らは、より進取の気性に富んだ使用人に取って代わられることになる。カスバリカ聖務団に所属する小規模だが野心的なウルトラレクイジター・シンジケートが、ヤヌスの統治を彼らに任せてほしいという下卑た要求をもってローグトレーダーに接触してきた。ヴラダイム・トカラがすべての競争相手を冷たき取引から追い出したため、ウルトレクイジターたちは自分たちの商売のやり方を変え、フォン・ヴァランシウス家に仕える威厳ある貴族になることを望んでいるのだ。

languages.text: In den Tagen der Meuterei floh ein Großteil des verwöhnten Adels von Janus vom Planeten. Sie sollen nun durch fleißigere Diener ersetzt werden. Ein kleines, aber ehrgeiziges Ultrequisitor-Syndikat, das Teil der Kasballica-Mission ist, hat {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} kontaktiert und bittet darum, die Verwaltung über Janus übernehmen zu dürfen. Nachdem Vladaym Tocara alle seine Rivalen aus dem Kalthandel gedrängt hat, hoffen die Ultrequisitoren, die Branche zu wechseln und zu würdevollen Aristokraten in Diensten des Hauses Valancius zu werden.
languages.original_text: In the days of the mutiny, many among Janus's pampered nobility fled the planet. They are to be replaced with more enterprising servants. A small but ambitious Ultrequisitor syndicate belonging to the Kasballica Mission has contacted the Rogue Trader with a lowly request to entrust the governance of Janus to them. With Vladaym Tocara pushing all of his competitors out of the Cold Trade, the Ultrequisitors are hoping to change their line of business and become dignified aristocrats serving House von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: In den Tagen der Meuterei floh ein Großteil des verwöhnten Adels von Janus vom Planeten. Sie sollen nun durch fleißigere Diener ersetzt werden. Ein kleines, aber ehrgeiziges Ultrequisitor-Syndikat, das Teil der Kasballica-Mission ist, hat {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} kontaktiert und bittet darum, die Verwaltung über Janus übernehmen zu dürfen. Nachdem Vladaym Tocara alle seine Rivalen aus dem Kalthandel gedrängt hat, hoffen die Ultrequisitoren, die Branche zu wechseln und zu würdevollen Aristokraten in Diensten des Hauses Valancius zu werden.

languages.text: İsyan sırasında Janus'un pohpohlanmış birçok soylusu gezegeni terk etmiş. Yerlerine daha girişimci hizmetkârlar atanacak. Kasballica Misyonu'na mensup, ufak ama hırslı bir Ultragizisyoncu birliği Hür Tacir'le iletişime geçerek Janus'un yönetiminin kendilerine bırakılmasını dilediler. Ultragizisyoncular, Vladaym Tocara'nın rakiplerini Soğuk Ticaret'ten bir bir defetmesinden ötürü çalışma alanlarını değiştirerek von Valancius Hanesi'ne hizmet eden şerefli aristokratlar olmayı umuyorlar.
languages.original_text: In the days of the mutiny, many among Janus's pampered nobility fled the planet. They are to be replaced with more enterprising servants. A small but ambitious Ultrequisitor syndicate belonging to the Kasballica Mission has contacted the Rogue Trader with a lowly request to entrust the governance of Janus to them. With Vladaym Tocara pushing all of his competitors out of the Cold Trade, the Ultrequisitors are hoping to change their line of business and become dignified aristocrats serving House von Valancius.
